paper.title: A Note on Petri Net Languages

author.org: Istituto di Elettrotecnica ed Elettronica del Politecnico di Milano, P. za L. da Vinci 32-20133, Milano, Italy

paper.abstract: It is shown that there is no effective procedure to construct a labeled Petri Net whose language is the complement of the language generated by a given labeled Petri Net.
